item.description:
Come one, come all.

What better way to beat the early week blues than hanging out at Providence's best summer bar.

The Hot Club is classic Providence and should be mandatory for everyone who lives in town.

It's the original waterfront bar with the great beer selection and a grill in the back.

If you haven't been to a meetup before, this is your chance to grab a beer or two and meet up with some cool folk.

Chat, feed the jukebox, play bar games or just enjoy the scenic view. It doesn't get easier than that.

Come and go whenever.

What are you waiting for? Hit yes.

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the people with the beer
item.name: Hang out at the Hot Club
